body: Hey guys remember me my username used to be Mopsi303. If you can remember me you probably have bad memories of me since I was a total idiot when I joined the server and I didn't really know how server forums work and I just copied everything from others! Sorry if I did harm you, I apologise deeply. As you can probably see my grammar has improved massively than the last time I posted something. I will be writing an I appeal soon! Just to ask what has been happening lately at avicus?
